name: 19::Add A Product To The Shopping Cart

actions.action: Click on a product link of "Hummingbird printed t-shirt".
actions.expectedResult: The product detail page for that item is displayed.

actions.action: Select a size 'M' from the dropdown.
actions.expectedResult: Size M is chosen from the dropdown.

actions.action: Check color Black in the colour options.
actions.expectedResult: The color Black is successfully selected.
A heading with the title "Product successfully added" appears.
